reqs:
ARTH 227 001 has both a lecture and corresponding tutorial sections. Both are required.
If this course is blocked, then it is full and a corresponding waiting list has been opened online. Please register in the waiting list, students will be moved from the waiting list into the course in order of date entered as spaces become available. While we hope all interested students will gain a seat, registration in the waiting list does not guarantee a seat in the course.
This tutorial section is taken in conjunction with ARTH 227 001. To register in a tutorial section you must first be registered in the lecture.
This section has been set up to allow you to register in it despite the apparent conflict with Friday's held time. If it will not allow you to register in the Friday tutorial section please contact the Department of Art History, Visual Art and Theory.
This tutorial section is taken in conjunction with ARTH 227 001. To register in a tutorial section you must first be registered in the lecture.

While we hope all interested students will gain a seat, registration in the waiting list does not guarantee a seat in the course.
courseName: Art and the Visual Environment in the Modern and Post-modern Periods
description: A selective survey of visual art, architecture and other visual media since 1900.
